name: Toy World
description: The Speed Racer toy car is a sleek and fast racing car with a shiny red exterior. It comes with realistic sound effects and working headlights. Your child will have hours of fun racing this car around the track!

name: Fun Toys
description: The Monster Truck toy car is a powerful and rugged vehicle capable of tackling any obstacle. It features large wheels and suspension for off-road adventures. Let your child's imagination run wild with this amazing toy!

name: Toy Haven
description: The Police Cruiser toy car is an exciting police vehicle with flashing lights and a siren. It includes a police officer figurine for added fun. Your child can play the role of a police officer and catch the bad guys with this awesome toy!

name: Car Lovers
description: Classic convertible roadster toy car with a sleek design, opening roof, and smooth wheels for cruising in style.

name: Toys Unlimited
description: Fire engine toy car with an extendable ladder, rotating water cannon, and realistic sound effects to save the day in imaginative rescue missions.

name: Speedy Toys
description: Complete race track set with multiple loops, ramps, and two high-speed toy cars for thrilling racing action.

name: Toy World
description: Sleek and fast racing car with a shiny red exterior, realistic sound effects, and working headlights for endless racing fun.

name: Fun Toys
description: Powerful and rugged off-road monster truck with large wheels and suspension, perfect for conquering any obstacle.

name: Sweet Treats
description: Colorful ice cream truck toy with a variety of delicious treats, a serving window, and a friendly ice cream vendor figurine.

name: Sporty Toys
description: Sleek sports coupe toy car with a shiny metallic finish, opening doors, and realistic engine sounds for high-speed adventures.

name: Rescue Heroes
description: Ambulance toy car with flashing lights, siren, and a paramedic figurine to provide help and save lives in imaginative rescue scenarios.

name: Outdoor Adventures
description: Off-road buggy toy car with a durable roll cage, oversized wheels, and suspension for thrilling outdoor expeditions.

name: City Wheels
description: Classic yellow taxi cab toy car with realistic details, opening doors, and a friendly driver figurine for city adventures.

name: Thrill Seekers
description: Stunt car toy with 360-degree spins, flips, and LED lights for incredible acrobatic performances.

name: Little Movers
description: Delivery truck toy with opening cargo doors and a removable driver figure for imaginative transportation adventures.

name: Speedy Toys
description: Set of two race cars with sleek designs, pull-back action, and a track for exciting head-to-head racing competitions.

name: Construction Zone
description: Large dump truck toy with a tilting bed for loading and unloading construction materials, perfect for pretend building projects.

name: Adventure Toys
description: Sports utility van toy car with a versatile design, opening doors, and ample storage space for all your adventurous journeys.

name: Speedy Toys
description: Expansion pack for race tracks, including extra tracks, ramps, and accessories to create more challenging and exciting race courses.

name: Young Explorers
description: Bright yellow school bus toy with opening doors and removable seats, ideal for pretend play and transporting imaginary students.
